thread.title: BRIEF-S A L Steel Announces One-Time Settlement With Invent Assets Securitisation & Reconstruction

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-S A L Steel Announces One-Time Settlement With Invent Assets Securitisation & Reconstruction

organizations.name: l steel announces one-time settlement with invent assets securitisation & reconstruction feb 27
reuters) - s a l steel ltd

text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - S A L Steel Ltd:
* ENTERED ONE TIME SETTLEMENT WITH INVENT IN RESPECT OF ENTIRE CREDIT FACILITIES AVAILED BY CO; SETTLED AMOUNT TO BE PAID UP TO MARCH 15 2023‍​
* UNION BANK OF INDIA, SBI, STATE BANK OF HYDERABAD, LENDERS ASSIGNED OUTSTANDING DEBTS TO INVENT ASSETS SECURITISATION & RECONSTRUCTION Source text - bit.ly/2HQr3ZY Further company coverage:
